abstract: Divers retrieve one of the black boxes from the AirAsia plane that went down on Dec 28 in the Java Sea, major breakthrough in the slow-moving hunt to recover bodies and wreckage.
lead_paragraph: Divers retrieved one of the black boxes on Monday from the AirAsia plane that went down on Dec. 28 in the Java Sea, a major breakthrough in the slow-moving hunt to recover bodies and wreckage.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and JOE COCHRANE

snippet: Divers retrieved one of the black boxes on Monday from the AirAsia plane that went down on Dec. 28 in the Java Sea, a major breakthrough in the slow-moving hunt to recover bodies and wreckage.

headline.main: Indonesia: AirAsia Flight 8501 Data Recorder Is Recovered
headline.print_headline: Indonesia: AirAsia Black Boxes Are Located
